title: Trump is Captain E.O., Worst WAP Reactions 8.11.20
itunes:title: Trump is Captain E.O., Worst WAP Reactions 8.11.20
description:
In episode 691, Jack and Miles are joined by producer and pop culture critic Joelle Monique to discuss Ben Shapiro reading the WAP lyrics, Trump's coronavirus executive order, media ignoring police violence during protests, election tampering, election results being delayed due to vote-by-mail, how we are doing with our coronavirus response, Carole Baskin's thoughts on the WAP video, Walt Disney World cutting their hours down, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Ben Shapiro reading the 'WAP' lyrics will make you laugh your 'd-word' off
  2. The top 3 unanswered questions about Trump's executive orders on coronavirus relief
  3. Full Navarro: Trump Is 'Hardest Working President In History' | Meet The Press | NBC News
  4. Kudlow: States can 'make room' for UI payments
  5. Violence, conversation breaks out at Back the Blue rally
  6. White House Says China Is Targeting U.S. Election With Cyberattacks, But Pelosi Says Threats From Russia And China Are 'Not Equivalent'
  7. FEC commissioner: 'Substantial chance' of no results on election night
  8. Five former CDC directors explain dire mistakes in America's coronavirus response - from sidelining science in favor of politics to 'sugarcoating' the severity of the pandemic
  9. Georgia high school reports nine coronavirus cases days after photos of packed hallways and students without masks go viral as local rep creates whistleblower hotline
  10. Carole Baskin Bashes Cardi B & Megan Thee Stallion's 'Lurid' Music Video for 'WAP' & 'Big Cat Pimps'
  11. Walt Disney World to Reduce Theme Park Hours Next Month
  12. WATCH: Merida’s Horse Gets Caught in a Balloon at Disney World Magic Kingdom During Small Princess Parade
  13. WATCH: Two Door Cinema Club - Something Good Can Work (The Twelves Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
